EmailTemplate.subject: TS140 End of Life Server Replacement: Requires your ATTN
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Valued Customer: McDonald’s Corporate announced that the TS140 Back Office and TS140 POS Servers are end-of-life and need to be replaced by October 1, 2023. The Lenovo SR250v1 BOS Server and Lenovo SR250v1 POS Server are the newest versions of servers that are approved by McDonald’s IT. Ordering Process & Pricing To help expedite the ordering process, NCR has loaded your site’s Lenovo SR250v1 Back Office Server and Lenovo SR250v1 POS Server in MyNCR, according to the latest Restaurant Reinvestment Tool and your OTP level (determines pro install or self install). - The current price for the Lenovo SR250v1 Back Office Server is $2470.28 plus staging. - The current price for the Lenovo SR250v1 POS Server is $2470.28 plus staging. - A PMO fee applies to each order. Installation Requirements: - Lenovo SR250v1 Back Office Server: - OTP 1, OTP 2 & OTP 3→Self Install ONLY - Lenovo SR250v1 POS Server - OTP 1 and OTP 2→Professional Install - OTP 3→Self install Your Action Steps: You will receive an email from MyNCR with you order. Please use that link and approve your order.
